About MeProjectsMostly Harmless

Advisor: Ken Sakashita, KEK IPNS

In my sophomore year of undergraduate studies I worked on studying and setting up the evacuation process of an liquid Argon time-projection-chamber at the KEK Neutrino Group through Japan’s SOKENDAI student research program.
